specifications.Dye Method: Piece Dye - Yarn Effect > High Twist Yarn High twist yarn is made by tightly twisting staple fibers or filament yarns, resulting in a higher number of twists per unit length. It adds texture, a crisp feeling, and a cool touch to the fabric.
specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Plain > Crepe This fabric can easily build up static electricity, especially in dry conditions. To prevent this, make sure the air has enough moisture.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Turn inside out before washing Non-chlorine bleach when needed, for whites only Tumble dry normal low heat Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Recommended Use Blouses
